settings.title: ear (2)
settings.heading: Community Dot Holders benefits
settings.lead_graph:
Ear (2) is here. And we would love for you to experience it. As a special thank you, we want to offer all Nothing Community Dot holders a special discount of $50/£30. Until 28 March, 23:59. 

Here are the steps:

  1. Connect your wallet containing a Nothing Community Dot.
  2. Enter your email to register. We suggest that you do not use disposable email addresses.
  3. Claim your exclusive discount code.
  4. Apply the discount code at checkout when you purchase Ear (2).

settings.question: What are Nothing Community Dots?
settings.answer: Nothing Community Dots are NFTs that have been gifted to our earliest supporters. They can also be earned through community contribution and are also available on the secondary market. Learn more about Nothing Community.

settings.question: Which wallets do you support?
settings.answer: Coinbase Wallet, MetaMask and also Wallet Connect, which supports a wide range of wallets.

settings.question: How do I connect my wallet?
settings.answer: Once you’ve selected your wallet type, launch the wallet app on your phone and scan the QR code on screen shown in your browser. You will then need to follow your wallets’ on-screen prompts to login.

settings.question: When I click on sign-up, it just says connecting?
settings.answer: Please check your wallet app and complete the prompts to verify your login.

settings.question: How many discounts do I get?
When I apply the discount at checkout, it says the discount code is invalid.
settings.answer: Please ensure that the email address you use to checkout is the same as the one you used when claiming the discount code. Please note, to use the discount code, Apple Pay's “Hide My Email” and other disposable emails are not supported. If problems persist, please contact customer support for assistance.

settings.question: Why does it show “not eligible” to claim?
settings.answer: This either means that you have already claimed the discount, or that your connected wallet does not contain a Nothing Community Dot.

settings.title: ear (2)
settings.heading: Offer unavailable
settings.lead_graph:
This offer is only available on nothing.tech, and not with any of our partner stores. We apologise for any inconvenience. 

This means it can't be redeemed if nothing.tech doesn't deliver to your country yet. 

Please head to Store Finder to find out where to buy Ear (2) in your location.
